archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0154
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want to be able to turn off certain notifcations, so that I don't get annoyed by them

properties.value: Requirement clear. Do you expect to steer this per each notification (can be hundreds of them) or per some group? Expectation: some groups would be defined. A nice to have - an option to disable a certain notification directly from the notification ("don't bother me again")

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
